item.title: Debugging in Elixir and Erlang - Part 2: Tracing Distributed Applications
item.description: How to use Erlang built-in tools for tracing distributed applications. Published on AppSignal Blog.
item.content:encoded:
This is the second and final part of a series about debugging and tracing tools on Elixir.

It covers tools already present in Erlang that can be used to debug and trace local or distributed applications.

Link: Debugging and Tracing in Erlang

Published on AppSignal Blog.
